cards.title: 1-2 punch
cards.effectDescription: Play: Stun an enemy creature. If that creature was already stunned, destroy it instead.

cards.title: bingle bangbang
cards.effectDescription: Before Fight: Deal 5Damage icon to each neighbor of the creature Bingle Bangbang fights.

cards.title: brammo
cards.effectDescription: Play: Deal 2Damage icon to each enemy flank creature.

cards.title: coward’s end
cards.effectDescription: Play: Destroy each undamaged creature. Gain 3 chains.

cards.title: cowfyne
cards.effectDescription: Before Fight: Deal 2Damage icon to each neighbor of the creature Cowfyne fights.

cards.title: drummernaut
cards.effectDescription: Play/Fight/Reap: Return a friendly Giant creature to your hand.

cards.title: first blood
cards.effectDescription:
Alpha. (You can only play this card before doing anything else this step.)
Play: Deal 2Damage icon for each friendly Brobnar creature. You may divide this damage among any number of creatures.

cards.title: foozle
cards.effectDescription: Reap: If an enemy creature has been destroyed this turn, gain 1Aember icon.

cards.title: ganger chieftain
cards.effectDescription:
Play: You may ready and fight with a neighboring creature.
It takes two to fight, but more is better.

cards.title: gauntlet of command
cards.effectDescription:
Action: Ready and fight with a friendly creature.
“I said ‘take me to your leader’ and got a fist to the face.” – Captain Val Jericho

cards.title: groggins
cards.effectDescription: When Groggins is used to fight, it can only attack flank creatures.

cards.title: groke
cards.effectDescription: Fight: Your opponent loses 1Aember icon.

cards.title: into the fray
cards.effectDescription: Play: For the remainder of the turn, a friendly Brobnar creature gains, “Fight: Ready this creature.”

cards.title: lollop the titanic
cards.effectDescription:
Lollop the Titanic deals no damage when attacked.
“Titans are to giants as giants are to goblins.” – Dr. Schucks

cards.title: pound
cards.effectDescription: Play: Deal 2Damage icon to a creature, with 1Damage icon splash.

cards.title: tremor
cards.effectDescription: Play: Stun a creature and each of its neighbors.

cards.title: blood money
cards.effectDescription:
Play: Place 2Aember icon from the common supply on an enemy creature.
“You! Æmber lover. You’re next.”

cards.title: blood of titans
cards.effectDescription:
This creature gets +5 power.
“Blood of Giants? Why stop there?” -Pingle Who Annoys

cards.title: burn the stockpile
cards.effectDescription:
Play: If your opponent has 7Aember icon or more, they lose 4Aember icon.
“If you can’t protect it, you don’t deserve it.” – Bilgum Avalanche

cards.title: culf the quiet
cards.effectDescription: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)

cards.title: flamethrower
cards.effectDescription:
Action: Deal 1Damage icon to a creature, with 1Damage icon splash.
The skalds were really hot that night.

cards.title: flamewake shaman
cards.effectDescription:
Play: Deal 2Damage icon to a creature.
There isn’t a big difference between the biggest humans and the smallest giants.

cards.title: gargantes scrapper
cards.effectDescription:
Alpha. (You can only play this card before doing anything else this step.)
Play: If you have 3Aember icon or more, deal 3Damage icon to an enemy creature.

cards.title: grump buggy
cards.effectDescription:
Your opponent’s keys cost +1Aember icon for each friendly creature with power 5 or higher.
Your keys cost +1Aember icon for each enemy creature with power 5 or higher.

cards.title: little rapscal
cards.effectDescription:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
Creatures must fight when used, if able.

“And they said I was annoying!” – Pingle Who Annoys

cards.title: ogopogo
cards.effectDescription: After Ogopogo attacks and destroys a creature, you may deal 2Damage icon to a creature.

cards.title: relentless assault
cards.effectDescription: Play: Ready and fight with up to 3 different friendly creatures, one at a time.

cards.title: screechbomb
cards.effectDescription:
Omni: Sacrifice Screechbomb.
Your opponent loses 2Aember icon.

“I think that thing made me deaf!”
“What? I can’t hear you! I think that thing made me deaf!”

cards.title: smith
cards.effectDescription: Play: Gain 2Aember icon if you control more creatures than your opponent.

cards.title: sound the horns
cards.effectDescription: Play: Discard cards from the top of your deck until you either discard a Brobnar creature or run out of cards. If you discarded a Brobnar creature this way, put it into your hand.

cards.title: the flex
cards.effectDescription: Play: Choose a ready friendly Brobnar creature. Exhaust it and gain Aember icon equal to half its power (rounding down the gain).

cards.title: the warchest
cards.effectDescription:
Action: Gain 1Aember icon for each enemy creature that was destroyed in a fight this turn.
It doesn’t matter what the treasure is, only how it was won.

cards.title: barehanded
cards.effectDescription: Play: Put each artifact on top of its owner’s deck.

cards.title: bellowing patrizate
cards.effectDescription:
While Bellowing Patrizate is ready, each creature takes 1Damage icon after it enters play.
”The mountain’s answer.” – Nirbor clan term for “avalanche.”

cards.title: bilgum avalanche
cards.effectDescription:
After you forge a key, deal 2Damage icon to each enemy creature.
“Some call her ‘warleader.’ Some call her ‘demon.’ I just call her ‘Avalanche.’” -Dodger

cards.title: champion’s challenge
cards.effectDescription: Play: Destroy each enemy creature except the most powerful enemy creature. Destroy each friendly creature except the most powerful friendly creature. Ready and fight with your remaining creature.

cards.title: cybergiant rig
cards.effectDescription:
This creature gains, “At the end of your turn, this creature loses a +1 power counter.”
Play: Fully heal this creature and give it a +1 power counter for each damage healed.

cards.title: forgemaster og
cards.effectDescription: After a player forges a key, they lose all of their remaining Aember icon.

cards.title: grumpus tamer
cards.effectDescription: Reap: Search your deck and discard pile for a War Grumpus, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.title: iron obelisk
cards.effectDescription: Your opponent’s keys cost +1Aember icon for each friendly damaged Brobnar creature.

cards.title: king of the crag
cards.effectDescription:
Each enemy Brobnar creature gets –2 power.
Overthrowing this king is an uphill battle.

cards.title: lava ball
cards.effectDescription:
Play: Deal 4Damage icon to a creature,
with 2Damage icon splash.

“Here...Catch!”

cards.title: might makes right
cards.effectDescription: Play: You may sacrifice any number of creatures with total power of 25 or more. If you do, forge a key at no cost.

cards.title: mugwump
cards.effectDescription: After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Mugwump, fully heal Mugwump and give it a +1 power counter.

cards.title: phoenix heart
cards.effectDescription: This creature gains, “Destroyed: Return this creature to its owner’s hand and deal 3Damage icon to each creature in play.”

cards.title: pile of skulls
cards.effectDescription: Each time an enemy creature is destroyed during your turn, a friendly creature captures 1Aember icon.

cards.title: rock-hurling giant
cards.effectDescription: During your turn, each time you discard a Brobnar card from your hand, you may deal 4Damage icon to a creature.

cards.title: shard of strength
cards.effectDescription:
Action: Give a friendly creature a +1 power counter for each friendly Shard.
Forged from joy.

cards.title: signal fire
cards.effectDescription: Omni: Destroy Signal Fire. For the remainder of the turn, friendly Brobnar creatures may fight as though they belonged to the active house.

cards.title: take that, smartypants
cards.effectDescription:
Play: Steal 2Aember icon if your opponent has 3 or more Logos cards in play.
“Them bots don’t wear pants. I carry spares.”

cards.title: tireless crocag
cards.effectDescription:
Tireless Crocag cannot reap.
You may use Tireless Crocag as if it belonged to the active house.

If your opponent has no creatures in play, destroy Tireless Crocag.

cards.title: war grumpus
cards.effectDescription:
Fight/Reap: Ready and fight with a neighboring Giant.
Only the Brobnar would look at a Grumpus and say, “Yeah, I’ll tame that.”

cards.title: æmber imp
cards.effectDescription:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
After a creature reaps, stun it.

“Even the rocks themselves suffer here.” – Eldest Bear

cards.title: banish
cards.effectDescription: Play: Put an enemy creature into your opponent’s archives.

cards.title: binding irons
cards.effectDescription:
Play: Your opponent gains 3 chains.
“I will not chain you. You have already chained yourself through your blind affection for these mortals.” — Judge Slenderwile, Archon

cards.title: charette
cards.effectDescription:
Play: Capture 3Aember icon.
It doesn’t like to share.

cards.title: cull the weak
cards.effectDescription: Play: Destroy the least powerful enemy creature.

cards.title: dust imp
cards.effectDescription: Destroyed: Gain 2Aember icon.

cards.title: exhume
cards.effectDescription: Play: Choose a creature in your discard pile. You may play that creature as if it belonged to the active house and was in your hand.

cards.title: gub
cards.effectDescription:
While Gub is not on a flank, it gets +5 power and gains taunt.
Don’t go into the light.

cards.title: lash of broken dreams
cards.effectDescription:
Action: Keys cost +3Aember icon during your opponent’s next turn.
“At first, I thought that nothing could harm an Archon.” – Captain Val Jericho

cards.title: misery exploit
cards.effectDescription: Play: Gain 1Aember icon for each damaged enemy creature.

cards.title: not finished with you
cards.effectDescription: Play: Shuffle any number of creatures from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.title: shooler
cards.effectDescription:
Play: If your opponent has 4Aember icon or more, steal 1Aember icon.
“Demons only take, never give.” – The Sanctified Scroll

cards.title: streke
cards.effectDescription:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
While Streke is not on a flank, your opponent refills their hand to 1 less card during their “draw cards” step.

cards.title: tezmal
cards.effectDescription:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
Reap: Choose a house. Your opponent cannot choose that house as their active house on their next turn.

cards.title: unlocked gateway
cards.effectDescription:
Omega. (After you play this card, end this step.)
Play: Destroy each creature.

“Well, just lock it again!” – Quixo the “Adventurer”

cards.title: yurk
cards.effectDescription:
Play: Choose and discard a card from your hand.
“They aren’t that bad if you can pay their price.” – Iona, Demonologist

cards.title: angwish
cards.effectDescription:
For each damage on Angwish, your opponent’s keys cost +1Aember icon.
“The more it hurts, the more it shares its pain. What a beautiful monster.” – Miss “Onyx” Censorius

cards.title: bloodshard imp
cards.effectDescription: After a creature reaps, its controller must sacrifice it.

cards.title: bronze key imp
cards.effectDescription:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
Players cannot forge their first key.

cards.title: gold key imp
cards.effectDescription:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
Players cannot forge their third key.

cards.title: gongoozle
cards.effectDescription:
Play: Deal 3Damage icon to a creature. If it is not destroyed, its owner discards a random card from their hand.
“Just trying to understand these… ’things’ gives me a headache.”

cards.title: hysteria
cards.effectDescription:
Play: Return each creature to its owner’s hand.
“Help! I can’t stop this feeling!”

cards.title: library of the damned
cards.effectDescription:
Action: Archive a card.
”This place takes the idea of losing yourself in a book to a whole new level.” – Doc Bookton

cards.title: lifeward
cards.effectDescription: Omni: Sacrifice Lifeward. Your opponent cannot play creatures on their next turn.

cards.title: old yurk
cards.effectDescription:
Play: Choose and discard 2 cards from your hand.
”As they get older, they get meaner.” – Iona, Demonologist

cards.title: pain reaction
cards.effectDescription: Play: Deal 2Damage icon to an enemy creature. If this damage destroys that creature, deal 2Damage icon to each of that creature’s neighbors after it leaves play.

cards.title: pandemonium
cards.effectDescription: Play: Each undamaged creature captures 1Aember icon from its opponent.

cards.title: poltergeist
cards.effectDescription: Play: Use an artifact controlled by any player as if it were yours. Destroy that artifact.

cards.title: silver key imp
cards.effectDescription:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
Players cannot forge their second key.

cards.title: skullion
cards.effectDescription:
Play: Sacrifice a friendly creature.
“Staying with the Skullions.” – Crucible slang for death
